divs: sighting detailssmall suburban area,pop.3000.monday.(totara park)(google satelite haylock grove for plot&scale)at 800ft....14deg.85%hum.one eighth cumulus to west.nil wind.broad valley floor.high surround hills,river(hutt),tracks southwest to exit wellinton harbour,20ms away. event one 1055hs. while mowing lawn,extremly large "tumbling,white-silver,bluish,gelatinous,milky deflated ghost balloon-like,exeptappears almost suborbital,atleast 10-20 ms long""oozes"at 30,000ft.airliner speed,east to west.appears luminous on vacating west.straight track. ...main event 1100hs. faced east,toward mountain range.(rimutaka range)observed fast approaching orange\brown\yellow churning cloud(1.5msaway)base 200ft.cloud advances westward to my loc.,passes over head,dissapears instantly when followed to west,vis.viewed to east again,complete east\southeast\northeast vision filled with 300ftcieling clockwise slowlychurning blue\grey mist flatbottom (disk)small embedded silver\vividblack approx 8,rotating with "mist"(looked like sperm under microscope)(had tails)...temperature has dropped few degs.looked around,&back,yes,its real.deadly silent,no ambient noise..petrified.estimated 1.5-2mis.wide,position rocksteady,stillrotating,i am on the western edge of it.1102hs. looked east&verticaly,discovered massive 3mile high glacier type sided "top"to the "disk",this part is rock steady,not turning.consists of "shortcropped"iceblue "vapour",has spaced"lobes"(2)bulging from side,that i could see.1103hs.observing southeast"wall"300ft.section twtches&glitters silver&vividblack,coarse vivid black highdefinition structured "intertwined"muscles appear through surface "mist"to surface,&"opened",birth port of sorts.a matariel erupts,and proceeds to"rapidly extrude"outwards toward me(range 1500ft)inote also avividly flashing"goo"with extending&retracting"fingers"fussing about arround on the "surface"around the "port".the emerging entity,heading toward me,now reveals itself to be a superslick streamlined prehistoric,slabeyed,cobra snake,no scales or plates,graphite\glass texture.no mouth.i start to experience internal body heating,floating,i then feel asensation of knowing what this entity is,(report continued furtherform)part one.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Upper Hutt
There was one other sighting in Upper Hutt on or around May 6th 1991
